Class IntBitSet

java.lang.Object
regexodus.ds.IntBitSet
public class IntBitSet extends Object
An implementation of BitSet (that does not technically extend BitSet due to BitSet not existing under GWT) using 32-bit sections instead of the normal 64-bit (again, for GWT reasons; 64-bit integer math is slower on GWT). This is a special-purpose class meant only for implementing Unicode blocks; it only ever contains 256 bits that may be individually true or false.

  • Constructor Summary

    IntBitSet(int start, int end)
    Constructs an IntBitSet that includes all bits between start and end, inclusive.
